entry.title: $2567 // Massive 3 Bedroom #@ apartment with sunny windows throughout
entry.content:
3 Bed / 1 Bath in Crown Heights, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Kingston - Throop Avs. Massive 3 Bedroom apartment with sunny windows throughout, hardwood floors, high ceilings, open concept living room and modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, exposed brick, 3 spacious bedrooms and ample closet space. Photos of a similar unit in the building. *Net Effective Pricing Based on 1 Month Free on an 18 Month Lease* We can help you find roommates on Nooklyn.
Amenities

High Ceilings
Hardwood floors
Exposed brick
Video Intercom
Laundry in building
Dishwasher
Stainless Steel Appliances
Eat In Kitchen
Stone countertops
Natural Light in Living Area
Exposed Brick
Hardwood Floors

TEXT Kate at 3-four-seven-834-sixteen-8-Eight and mention this ad, referring to specific details (price, number of bedrooms & street or neighborhood). I also have plenty of other listings in the same area, just ask!

entry.title: $2300 // {{- Newly renovated spacious 1 Br w washer dryer! -}}
entry.content:
Rogers Ave Bet Carroll & President St

Blocks from the Brooklyn botanical Garden and Prospect Park Zoo

* 2/3/4/5 Trains a short walk
* Washer dryer inside unit
* Brand new stainless steel appliances
* Air conditioning units in each room
* Right by many restaurants and shops
* Pet friendly

This place won't last long so contact me to check it out!
